participant_1.name: Emma Dawson
participant_1.personality: Friendly and curious, Emma enjoys engaging with others and is always eager to make new connections.
participant_1.background: She has a degree in psychology and works as a counselor, which makes her empathetic and understanding in conversations.

participant_2.name: Liam Carter
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and witty, Liam loves to socialize and often brings humor into his interactions.
participant_2.background: With a background in marketing, he thrives in creative environments and is skilled at networking.
